channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Leftist Wins Wisconsin Supreme Court Election, Keeping Power In Liberals’ Hands
item.description: Backed by wealthy socialists, liberal candidate Susan Crawford beat conservative Brad Schimel in Tuesday's pivotal election.

item.title: What degree of power will America command in NATO? Europe warily awaits U.S. secretary Marco Rubio to determine the future of the alliance
item.description: For 75 years, NATO has been anchored on American leadership. With Trump now back in office, European officials have expressed deep concerns.

item.title: WI Voters Overwhelmingly Approve Voter ID Amendment To State Constitution
item.description: Wisconsin is among a handful of states that have enshrined the popular voter-integrity measure in state constitutions.

item.title: Dems mum on Trump's court fights despite trying to limit Biden-blocking judges
item.description: Democrats are quiet now that nationwide injunctions are limiting Trump, but during Biden’s presidency, they introduced legislation to address it.

item.title: Republicans Win Special House Elections, Expanding Slim Majority
item.description: Republican candidates won both special House elections in Florida on Tuesday night, expanding the party's slim majority in the lower chamber.

item.title: Wisconsin voters enshrine voter ID requirement in state constitution
item.description: Wisconsin voters decided Tuesday to enshrine the state's voter ID law in the state constitution.

item.title: Europe’s Latest Attacks On Free Speech And Free Elections Prove Vance’s Munich Warning Right
item.description: Vance warned that shutting down speech destroys democracy. European leaders have apparently taken his statement as an instruction manual.

item.title: Biden-appointed judge blocks Trump admin from terminating legal aid for unaccompanied migrant children
item.description: A federal judge in California has blocked the Trump administration from cutting off legal counsel funding for unaccompanied migrant minors.
